name: Pit Login Welcome
author: Pantho Bihosh

sections.description:
To buy Pro Version Click Here

This is a Premium Plugin. Pit Login Welcome is a Plugin which can give a Random Welcome message to your blog/Website’s users when login. You can also change WordPress login page Logo & Background.

Logo Change: You can change Login Page logo easily from this option.

Background Change: Login page background color or photo can be change from here. So your website login page will be more beautiful & nice.

Login Page Message: This option is first time in WordPress. You can some messages like welcome messages or tips & tricks for your registered users. So anyone open the login page she/he can read your welcome messages or tips & tricks. All messages show randomly. You can add unlimited messages.

Plugin Demo

  • Free Version Demo: http://www.bihosh.com/wp-admin
  • Pro Version Demo: http://www.webingnet.com/wp-admin/
sections.installation:
From WordPress Plugin Directory

  • Search ‘Pit-Login-Welcome’ to Plugins library
  • Install the plugin by click the Install option
  • Activate the plugin
  • Setup the plugin from settings page under your WordPress dashboard.

From Your Computer

  • Download the ‘Pit-Login-Welcome.zip’ file from WordPress plugins directory
  • Upload to ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  • Unzip the plugin folder
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress Dashboard
  • Setup the plugin from settings page under your WordPress dashboard

by FTP

  • Download the plugin from WordPress Plugins directory
  • Unzip the zip folder
  • Upload all folders & files to ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  • Activate the plugin
  • Setup the plugin from settings page under your WordPress dashboard
sections.faq:
Q. How Can I Setup the Plugin?

A. After install & activate the plugin you will get a settings page under your WP Dashboard. Check the Settings Page.

Q. Is this a Free Plugin?

A. Yes. But we have pro version also here- http://www.webingnet.com/product/wp-login-welcome-pro/ . So you can upgrade to pro version any time.

Q. What is the difference between FREE VERSION & PRO VERSION?

A. There are huge difference between FREE & PRO VERSION. But the simple is- in free version, you get only 3 options. But in Pro Version you will get huge options. So you can customize the login page as your thinking, as your needs.

Q. How can I upgrade to Pro Version?

A. Its very simple. Just Deactivate the Free version, then delete the plugin from your dashboard. After than upload Pro version & Activate the plugin. You will see the imagine.
